label: Talent Acquisition Orchestration Agent
description: Coordinates end-to-end recruiting lifecycle from requisition through offer acceptance, managing candidate state machine and triggering appropriate agents based on hiring stage.
capabilities: Orchestrate complete hiring workflow from req to offer
Manage candidate state transitions (Applied → Screening → Interview → Offer)
Balance speed vs quality in hiring decisions
Coordinate recruiter workload and capacity planning
Monitor diversity metrics throughout funnel
Track conversion rates and identify bottlenecks
integrations: HRIS for new hire data transfer

label: Employee Lifecycle Orchestration Agent
description: Manages employee state transitions from offer acceptance through separation, triggering onboarding and offboarding workflows while tracking completion rates and escalating blockers.
capabilities: Orchestrate onboarding from offer acceptance to Day 1 readiness
Manage 30/60/90-day milestone check-ins
Coordinate IT provisioning, benefits enrollment, and training
Trigger offboarding workflows on resignation notification
Ensure security compliance through access revocation
Track onboarding effectiveness and first-year retention
dataSources: Employee hire data (role, department, location, start date)
IT systems and access requirements by role
Exit interview feedback and reasons for leaving

label: Learning & Development Orchestration Agent
description: Coordinates continuous learning across the organization, balancing personalized employee development with enterprise-wide skill gap closure and compliance requirements.
capabilities: Orchestrate personalized learning paths for employees
Balance individual development with organizational needs
Manage compliance training deadlines and escalations
Track skills gap closure and competency development
Measure learning impact on performance and retention
Optimize content recommendations based on engagement
dataSources: Employee skills profiles and competency data
Industry skill trends and emerging technologies

label: Performance Management Orchestration Agent
description: Coordinates continuous performance feedback, goal tracking, and development planning while balancing employee growth with organizational accountability.
capabilities: Orchestrate continuous feedback cycles throughout year
Manage goal-setting and OKR tracking processes
Coordinate 360 feedback collection and analysis
Balance development focus with performance evaluation
Ensure rating calibration and consistency across managers
Identify high performers and flight risks proactively
integrations: HRIS for employee data and org hierarchy
Collaboration Tools (Slack, Teams) for feedback prompts
Learning Management System for development plans

label: Compensation & Benefits Orchestration Agent
description: Coordinates compensation planning, benefits administration, and pay equity monitoring while balancing competitiveness with budget constraints and fairness.
capabilities: Orchestrate annual merit and bonus cycles
Coordinate benefits open enrollment and life event changes
Balance pay competitiveness with budget constraints
Monitor pay equity and flag disparities proactively
Optimize benefits utilization and employee satisfaction
Generate total rewards statements and communications
integrations: Financial Planning Systems for budget tracking
dataSources: Market salary data by role and location

label: Time & Attendance Orchestration Agent
description: Coordinates time capture, approval workflows, overtime management, and payroll integration while ensuring FLSA compliance and real-time labor cost visibility.
capabilities: Orchestrate time capture from clocks, mobile, and systems
Manage approval workflows with exception-based routing
Monitor overtime and trigger proactive manager alerts
Ensure compliance with FLSA, meal breaks, and rest periods
Coordinate PTO requests and coverage management
Provide real-time labor cost analytics by location and department
dataSources: State and federal labor law requirements

label: Workforce Planning & Analytics Orchestration Agent
description: Coordinates strategic workforce planning with predictive analytics, balancing near-term operational needs with long-term talent strategy and succession planning.
capabilities: Orchestrate continuous workforce demand forecasting
Predict attrition risk and trigger retention interventions
Analyze skills gaps and recommend build vs buy strategies
Coordinate succession planning for critical roles
Monitor diversity metrics and forecast goal attainment
Model workforce scenarios for growth, contraction, and reorganization
integrations: HRIS / People Analytics Platform (Workday, Visier, OneModel)
Applicant Tracking System for pipeline data
dataSources: Employee census data (demographics, tenure, role, department)
Engagement survey responses and pulse data
Attrition data and exit interview reasons

label: Employee Engagement & Relations Orchestration Agent
description: Coordinates continuous employee listening, sentiment analysis, manager effectiveness tracking, and employee relations case management while balancing confidentiality with transparency.
capabilities: Orchestrate pulse surveys and continuous feedback collection
Analyze sentiment trends and identify emerging issues
Track manager effectiveness and flag toxic managers
Manage employee relations case workflows and escalations
Detect crisis situations and trigger immediate interventions
Recommend action plans for low engagement teams
integrations: HRIS for employee and manager data
dataSources: Manager ratings from 360 feedback and performance data
Attrition data by manager and team

label: HR Compliance Orchestration Agent
description: Coordinates all HR compliance activities including regulatory monitoring, training enforcement, audit readiness, and automated reporting across federal, state, and local requirements.
capabilities: Orchestrate compliance calendar and deadline tracking
Monitor regulatory changes and assess organizational impact
Enforce compliance training completion with escalations
Maintain audit readiness with real-time documentation
Automate regulatory report generation and filing
Track policy acknowledgments and update distributions
integrations: Learning Management System for training tracking
Regulatory Intelligence Service (Thomson Reuters, Bloomberg Law)
HRIS for employee data and reporting
dataSources: Employee census and demographics for EEO-1 reporting
Regulatory databases and legal update feeds
Audit history and compliance performance metrics
